testcase.name: open Epam page check title
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given I open epam.com✅ When Page title should be 'EPAM | Enterprise Software Development, Design & Consulting'✅ Then I wait 1 seconds

testcase.name: Navigation menu hover
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given I open epam.com✅ Given I move mouse to navigation menu "0" items✅ Then Each menu item "0" should change color to "rgba(118,205,216,1)"

testcase.name: Navigation menu hover
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given I open epam.com✅ Given I move mouse to navigation menu "1" items✅ Then Each menu item "1" should change color to "rgba(123,187,198,1)"

testcase.name: Navigation menu hover
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given I open epam.com✅ Given I move mouse to navigation menu "2" items✅ Then Each menu item "2" should change color to "rgba(118,205,216,1)"

testcase.name: Navigation menu hover
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given I open epam.com✅ Given I move mouse to navigation menu "3" items✅ Then Each menu item "3" should change color to "rgba(123,187,198,1)"

testcase.name: Navigation menu hover
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given I open epam.com✅ Given I move mouse to navigation menu "4" items✅ Then Each menu item "4" should change color to "rgba(118,205,216,1)"

testcase.name: Navigation menu hover
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given I open epam.com✅ Given I move mouse to navigation menu "5" items✅ Then Each menu item "5" should change color to "rgba(118,205,216,1)"

testcase.name: Search
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given I open epam.com✅ Given I click on the Search icon✅ Then Should open search field✅ When I set the searching word and click search icon✅ And Should see search results

testcase.name: Our Work page
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given I open epam.com✅ Given I go to 'Our Work' page✅ Then Page title should be 'Explore our Work | EPAM Customer Stories, Brochures & Accelerators'✅ When I fill 'Filter By' fields✅ Then Should see filters
